data.value: 你确定要离开吗?

data.value: 等级

data.value: 谈话纪录

data.value: 魔力

data.name: Yes
data.value: 确定

data.name: Z001
data.value: 很抱歉，目前没有空房间，请稍待一会

data.name: Z002
data.value: 是否储存游戏？

data.name: Z003
data.value: 是否休息一下

data.name: Z004
data.value: 黄金

data.name: Z005
data.value: 感谢您的消费

data.name: Z006
data.value: 欢迎再度光临

data.name: Z007
data.value: 游戏已储存，您是否需要休息一下

data.name: Z008
data.value: 先生，很抱歉你没有足够的黄金

data.name: Z009
data.value: 我想你不会想去那里！

data.name: Z010
data.value: 今天的天气真适合散步，是吧？

data.name: Z011
data.value: 真不敢相信，你居然打败了所有的土匪。你是我的英雄！

data.name: Z012
data.value: 真高兴能见到你，英雄

data.name: Z013
data.value: 你找到三个红色药水

data.name: Z014
data.value: 小心点, 你还没有痊愈. 别太操劳了!

data.name: Z015
data.value: You were so brave, fighting off those bandits. I hope you didn't hurt yourself.

data.name: Z016
data.value: He is dead. There is nothing you can do for him.

data.name: Z017
data.value: Hey buddy, can you please help me?

data.name: Z018
data.value: 我把我最珍貴的寶物遺失在這個村莊裡了

data.name: Z019
data.value: 如果你可以幫我找到它,我將會報答你!

data.name: Z020
data.value: 我記的我最後一次看到它是我在井邊喝酒的時候

data.name: Z021
data.value: hey兄弟, 你在那邊拿到了什麼?

data.name: Z022
data.value: 我最珍貴的寶物是不是在水井附近?

data.name: Z023
data.value: 太感謝你了! 這邊是

data.name: Z024
data.value: 黃金, 報答你的辛勞!

data.name: Z025
data.value: 太感謝你了! 這邊是

data.name: Z026
data.value: 黃金, 報答你的辛勞!

data.name: Z027
data.value: 感謝你再次找到我珍貴的寶物!

data.name: Z028
data.value: 嗨 你早阿~!

data.name: Z029
data.value: 我看到你有一些種子, 真希望我能幫你種這些種子,但是我的產子不見了.

data.name: Z030
data.value: 我相信是森林南部小鎮,該死的土匪拿的

data.name: Z031
data.value: 哇, 小姐! 我看到那那些就像一群雜草長在花園該死的土匪. 你真了不起!

data.name: Z032
data.value: 歡迎回來小姐!重來沒看過妳離開, 城裡的人都在討論妳呢.

data.name: Z033
data.value: 太棒了~~

data.name: Z034
data.value: 讓我幫你種這些迷人的種子吧! 免費!!

data.name: Z035
data.value: 你終於回來了阿,它們都長大了!

data.name: Z036
data.value: 抱歉小姐,它還是沒長出來

data.name: Z037
data.value: 你一定要有耐心點,這是農場經營

data.name: Z038
data.value: 你的種子已經長大,你隨時都可以把它帶走

data.name: Z039
data.value: 你可能在想這是什麼,其實我自己也在思考

data.name: Z040
data.value: 我現在就可以告訴你 它一定不會是玉米... HAYUK! HAYUK! HAYUK!

data.name: Z041
data.value: 小姐, 我能幫你

data.name: Z042
data.value: 能看到您回來真好

data.name: Z043
data.value: 正如你所見,我的傷口已經完全治癒好了, 我希望我弟弟也能好起來

data.name: Z044
data.value: 在你們的戰鬥中那個穿的紅色圍巾的突匪殺死了他,然後像個懦夫一樣的逃進了森林南部的小鎮

data.name: Z045
data.value: 要不我有責任保護這個村莊,我一定會找到他然後為我弟報酬!

data.name: Z046
data.value: 什麼?紅色圍巾?

data.name: Z047
data.value: 我弟可以安息了,感謝你

data.name: Z048
data.value: 請收下,這是我的弟的.我相信他會希望你能收下.

data.name: Z049
data.value: 祝你一路順風

data.name: Z050
data.value: 哇! 是你! 村子的英雄!

data.name: Z051
data.value: 我聽到土匪王準備接收蘑菇森林,我本來是為了打敗這個壞蛋,但是我失敗了

data.name: Z052
data.value: 我祖母一定很擔心我,你能幫助我找到回家的路嗎?

data.name: Z053
data.value: 唉唷. 我那奸詐的老祖母說她永遠不會讓我離開房子!

data.name: Z054
data.value: 這是你的劍. 經過我精湛的手藝. 你可以在你的物品籃找到你的劍

data.name: Z055
data.value: 別這樣看這我小兄弟, 我只會製造武器,我不會使用它

data.name: Z056
data.value: 還有我知道你沒有錢,滾開!

data.name: Z057
data.value: 你們這邊有什麼? 劍柄嗎?這個劍柄已經損壞的很嚴重,但我不知道怎麼辦

data.name: Z058
data.value: 交給我修理

data.name: Z059
data.value: 黃金,所以以想說什麼? 我一整天都拿不到

data.name: Z060
data.value: 明天就可以修好了

data.name: Z061
data.value: 滾開! 你這個小氣鬼!

data.name: Z062
data.value: 蛤? 你是聾子嗎? 我說你明天就可以拿到了! 你可以走了!

data.name: Z063
data.value: 你拯救了我們村莊,所以你到底想要什麼?獎章? 滾開我的店!

data.name: Z064
data.value: 不要在浪費我的時間了! 你就是沒有錢.

data.name: Z065
data.value: 我所有的東西都賣光了,請稍後再來.

data.name: Z066
data.value: 你想要看我的商品嗎?

data.name: Z067
data.value: 沒關西,感謝你拯救了我們的村莊

data.name: Z068
data.value: 你以拿起流浪者的珍貴寶物

data.name: Z069
data.value: 很高興你好多了.只要你需要你可以待在我們的村莊

data.name: Z070
data.value: 我看到你拯救了我們的村莊,你的劍術真是令人驚艷!

data.name: Z071
data.value: 讓我提供你一些幫助,這裡是

data.name: Z072
data.value: 黃金

data.name: Z073
data.value: 我的村永遠都歡迎你!歡迎再來!

data.name: Z074
data.value: 我看我女兒已經決定要跟著妳了

data.name: Z075
data.value: 依照我的經驗,當她下定決心後是很難改變的

data.name: Z076
data.value: 拜託請好好照顧她,她是我的唯一.

data.name: Z077
data.value: 歡迎回來, Nathan

data.name: Z078
data.value: 在磨菇森林要保持警覺,土匪王布個好惹的傢伙

data.name: Z079
data.value: 哇這不是土匪王的黃冠嗎?你真了不起年輕人!

data.name: Z080
data.value: 請收下這個東西當作我們村子的謝禮

data.name: Z081
data.value: 你已收到1000黃金 和 光榮之戒

data.name: Z082
data.value: 你必須檢起磨菇, 請查看你的物品籃

data.name: Z083
data.value: 在磨菇後面的樹有一隻壞掉的劍插在土壤上

data.name: Z084
data.value: 你收到 一隻劍柄 和 蘑菇, 劍柄上的記號好熟悉, 請查看您的物品籃

data.name: Z085
data.value: 你找到 正義之戒

data.name: Z086
data.value: 你找到 補藥(小)

data.name: Z087
data.value: 你找到 藥水(小)

data.name: Z088
data.value: 你找到 補藥(中) X2

data.name: Z089
data.value: 你找到 藥水(大)

data.name: Z090
data.value: 你找到 正義之戒

data.name: Z091
data.value: 你的種子已成熟

data.name: Z092
data.value: 你撿起 Mysteria

data.name: Z093
data.value: 謝謝你的蘑菇, Sonny

data.name: Z094
data.value: 哇!你找到好多磨菇. 可以為我孫子做很棒的蘑菇湯, 但我還需要更多

data.name: Z095
data.value: 你可以在幫我找一些嗎? 你人真好

data.name: Z096
data.value: 我孫子病很重.他最喜歡蘑菇湯了.他總是特別開心當他在喝湯的時候

data.name: Z097
data.value: 唉. 我已經沒有磨菇了. 我該怎麼做. 我太老了已經沒辦法自己去採蘑菇了

data.name: Z098
data.value: 這樣就夠了, 感謝你的幫忙 這邊是

data.name: Z099
data.value: 黃金,當作我的答謝

data.name: Z100
data.value: 什麼?你找到了劍柄? 這看起來不錯 Sonny.

data.name: Z101
data.value: 哇, 我想這些蘑菇已經足夠做我孫子的蘑菇湯了

data.name: Z102
data.value: 你看, 我孫子真的病很重, 蘑菇湯總上能讓他感覺好一點. 來..把蘑菇放在桌上.

data.name: Z103
data.value: 真的很感謝你, 這裡是

data.name: Z104
data.value: 黃金, 當作我的答謝

data.name: Z105
data.value: 什麼?你找到了劍柄? 這看起來不錯 Sonny.

data.name: Z106
data.value: 我真的超怕那些土匪, 我以為我的心臟要停了,謝謝你就了我們Sonny

data.name: Z107
data.value: 天阿.....Sonny 我的孫子不見了!

data.name: Z108
data.value: 我想他可能去蘑菇森林了, 至從你離開以後就經常看到土匪在哪裡出沒.

data.name: Z109
data.value: 天阿, 我好擔心他, 你可以幫我一個忙嗎?幫我找找他. 我也會去找找只是我這些老骨頭可能不重用了.

data.name: Z110
data.value: 真高興你能找到我孫子! 拜託 這些東西請收下 !

data.name: Z111
data.value: 感謝您的再次幫忙, Sonny

data.name: Z112
data.value: 你以撿起 一本筆記

data.name: Z113
data.value: 我祖母不會再讓我離開床了, 他一直覺得我病很重

data.name: Z114
data.value: 但我才不是! 我是村子中最強的戰士, 我這麼強壯怎麼可能生病

data.name: Z115
data.value: 我才不想管她說什麼! 我就是要離開床布!

data.name: Z116
data.value: 喀! 喀! 唉......我想我還是在躺一下子好了.

data.name: Z117
data.value: 哇! 你真的結決了那些骯髒的的土匪? 其實我也想幫助你, 但是你也知道我那個奸詐的祖母不會讓我去的

data.name: Z118
data.value: 你找到 藥水(大)

data.name: Z119
data.value: 你找到 補藥(中)

data.name: Z120
data.value: 你找到 訓練者的腰帶

data.name: Z121
data.value: 你找到 魔法戰鬥之戒

data.name: Z122
data.value: 你找到 補藥(大)

data.name: Z123
data.value: 你找到 天空之鍊

data.name: Z124
data.value: 你找到 自然之鍊

data.name: Z125
data.value: 你找到 火焰之鍊

data.name: Z126
data.value: 你找到 土靈手套

data.name: Z127
data.value: 你找到 海洋之鍊

data.name: Z128
data.value: 你找到 藥水(中)

data.name: Z129
data.value: 你找到 尖刺之鍊

data.name: Z130
data.value: 你找到 小偷之戒

data.name: Z131
data.value: 你找到 戰鬥領主之戒

data.name: Z132
data.value: 你找到 2000 黃金 和 戰鬥領主之戒

data.name: Z133
data.value: 你找到了怪獸!

data.name: Z134
data.value: 拜託請救救我們! 我的朋友還在城堡裡面. 不知道哪來的怪獸,你有武器吧?

data.name: Z135
data.value: 拜託救救我吧!

data.name: Z136
data.value: 謝謝你救了我!!我以為我死定了....

data.name: Z137
data.value: 喔! 我點忘記了. 有個神祕男子走向了塔頂

data.name: Z138
data.value: 我害怕他也在找神器... 我想要去找我朋友了, 她因該很害怕現在. 謝謝你

data.name: Z139
data.value: 我才不相信你! 你還記得之前在塔前面?

data.name: Z140
data.value: 你救了我! 我不會讓你離開我.

data.name: Z141
data.value: 我後來就沒見到你了...恩,你知道那天發生了什嗎?

data.name: Z142
data.value: 感謝你! 我永遠都會記得你對我做的事情!

data.name: Z143
data.value: 我永遠都虧欠你

data.name: Z144
data.value: 你選擇了 空箱子

data.name: Z145
data.value: 你選擇了 錯誤的箱子

data.name: Z147
data.value: 你找到了黃金

data.name: Z148
data.value: 哇 有東西跑進我的箱子!!

data.name: Z149
data.value: 每次我要拿我的金子的時候,它們總是跑來跑去.

data.name: Z150
data.value: 或許你有辦法找出金子在哪個箱子裡.

data.name: Z151
data.value: 好眼力! 謝謝你幫我找到黃金,請收下這個禮物

data.name: Z152
data.value: 現在我的黃金都消失了!

data.name: Z153
data.value: 不客氣!

data.name: Z154
data.value: 不過還是謝謝你, 我有感覺可能是幽靈!

data.name: Z155
data.value: 請收下這酬勞

data.name: Z156
data.value: 真感謝你, 我的金子都回來了!

data.name: Z157
data.value: 我現在該怎麼辦?我的金子都不見了!

data.name: Z158
data.value: 感謝你驅趕了這些幽靈

data.name: Z159
data.value: 請選擇一個箱子裡面有黃金的

data.name: Z160
data.value: 拜託, 請幫我們淨化圖書館. 大俠

data.name: Z161
data.value: 謝謝你幫我們淨化了圖書館. 大俠

data.name: Z162
data.value: 很抱歉之前的事, 我因該多注意點.

data.name: Z163
data.value: 感謝你淨化了圖書館. 歡迎你再來! 我的朋友.

data.name: Z164
data.value: 我是圖書館館長, 我不知道為什麼這裡會變成這樣.但是你要去清理吧?是吧?

data.name: Z165
data.value: 看吧, 你不是魔法師, 你一定會被卡在那邊的. 我們魔法師有魔法通道.它幫助我們穿梭在圖書館

data.name: Z166
data.value: 這跟你找到這個城市的方法相似, 你一定要先找到通道先!

data.name: Z167
data.value: 所以當你找不到路的時候,讓書來引導你正確的方向

data.name: Z168
data.value: 這全部都是因螳螂? 早知道我就因該多注意Billy一點

data.name: Z169
data.value: 他喜歡閱讀有關於怪物的書. 他遲早會招喚出怪物.

data.name: Z170
data.value: 嗯..感謝你拯救了我們的圖書館. 我不期待你能整裡所有的雜亂. 我想我會找到方法.當我回來的時候

data.name: Z171
data.value: 箱子無法開啟!

data.name: Z172
data.value: 為了要淨化圖書館. 你一定要摧毀源頭

data.name: Z173
data.value: 祝你幸運, 年輕人

data.name: Z174
data.value: 你必須去找雪村裡的鐵匠

data.name: Z175
data.value: 你需要找到Gargas. 我想他須重灌你的Lacuna Reaver. 這是個好消息

data.name: Z176
data.value: 我也恢復記憶了.我叔叔Arlan 計畫要喚醒 Mal'ticar

data.name: Z177
data.value: 有任何辦法我們可以阻止他嗎?

data.name: Z178
data.value: 蛤? 你確定嗎? Arlan是怎麼知道儀式的?

data.name: Z179
data.value: 我把所有的文本都銷毀了.

data.name: Z180
data.value: 他怎麼會知道已經不重要了.我必須要阻止他!

data.name: Z181
data.value: 儀式的最後一段一定要在 Verithus 城堡

data.name: Z183
data.value: 我會招集一些法術師,然後我們在Ellaethia的最南端集合

data.name: Z184
data.value: 快! 我們沒有時間可以浪費了!

data.name: Z185
data.value: 快到最南端.我會追上你們的

data.name: Z186
data.value: 不用當心我們,年輕人.你需要全力阻止你叔叔. 不太遲了

data.name: Z188
data.value: 啊~ 我不知道!

data.name: Z189
data.value: 我找如何打開箱子的指南了, 但是我看不懂. 天阿...我永遠都無法打開它

data.name: Z190
data.value: 我知道了 2 5 4 1 3! 就是這五個箱子!

data.name: Z191
data.value: 蛤? 你已經知道了? 可惡被你先想出來了!

data.name: Z192
data.value: 大俠! 你一定要幫我! 翻翻和我在圖書館裡玩躲迷

data.name: Z193
data.value: 嗅" 我....是管理員..這裡拜已經鬼魂佔據了... 我可以聽到他們在呼喚我............

data.name: Z194
data.value: 你找到了他, 大俠!

data.name: Z195
data.value: 你有看到我的翻翻嗎?

data.name: Z196
data.value: 翻翻! 你是我見過最好的人了! 真的很謝謝你. 我要回去跟翻翻玩了. 你要跟我們一起玩嗎?

data.name: Z197
data.value: 嘿!大俠! 翻翻說謝謝你. 滾開!

data.name: Z198
data.value: 快走, 大俠! 翻翻說他不需要

data.name: Z199
data.value: 這是最後一次, 大俠. 翻翻說如果你在不離開的話 他就會傷害你..拜託你趕快走!

data.name: Z200
data.value: 我不喜歡翻翻生氣的時候

data.name: Z201
data.value: 你把我的警告當作耳邊風. 現在是以付出代價的時候了!

data.name: Z202
data.value: 準備受死吧.就像這些一樣!

data.name: Z203
data.value: 翻翻!! 你為什麼要這樣傷害翻翻?! 你從來沒有傷害你!

data.name: Z204
data.value: 翻翻說她很高興跟你在一起. 我還記的.我第一次遇到他的時候 他才六歲.

data.name: Z205
data.value: 自從我們第一次見面後 .翻翻和我一直都是好朋友

data.name: Z206
data.value: 剛走下來的時候你有覺得頭暈暈的嗎?穿過秘密通道的時候, 感覺有點重心不穩.

data.name: Z207
data.value: 當 Ellaethia 和 Agora 被拆散的時候. 大法師把 Celindar 顛倒放. 為了要把他們藏在地下

data.name: Z208
data.value: 我們以為Mal'ticar 要把我們全部消滅.所以這是拯救我們的種族和歷史的唯一方法

data.name: Z209
data.value: 魔法真是太神奇了!

data.name: Z210
data.value: 我真榮幸能見證這歷史的一刻!

data.name: Z211
data.value: 英雄, 祝你好運

data.name: Z212
data.value: 這是你的盔甲, 希望你會喜歡

data.name: Z213
data.value: 所以你救是那個引起騷動的人?

data.name: Z214
data.value: Ruith 如果知道我幫你的話 他因該會很失望..

data.name: Z215
data.value: 呸. 我就是看他不順眼

data.name: Z217
data.value: 多少黃金?

data.name: Z218
data.value: 你想說什麼?

data.name: Z219
data.value: 明天再過來拿吧

data.name: Z220
data.value: 好. 但是你會後悔的

data.name: Z221
data.value: 不夠錢? 真糟糕

data.name: Z222
data.value: 我還好,孩子. 但也不是太好. 你明天再來吧.

data.name: Z223
data.value: 那個盔甲對你怎麼了?

data.name: Z224
data.value: 你會收到你的盔甲

data.name: Z225
data.value: 盔甲的每一片都充滿了魔法

data.name: Z226
data.value: 你想看看我的商品嗎?

data.name: Z227
data.value: 你對這些鼴鼠有興趣啊?我們在大法師把Celindar顛倒埋在地底下的時候發現他們的

data.name: Z228
data.value: 當我們其中一個人需要到地面上的時候.我會騎著鼴鼠穿越山脈

data.name: Z229
data.value: 只要你把圖書館清理乾淨. 我就會讓你把他們其中一隻帶去另外一邊

data.name: Z230
data.value: 謝謝你救了我們的圖書館. 讓我們一機能保留到下一個世代

data.name: Z231
data.value: 你想要騎著鼴鼠到Ellaethia的另一邊嗎?

data.name: Z232
data.value: 小心 保重!

data.name: Z233
data.value: 你想要待多久都行! 當你準備好的時候通知我!

data.name: Z234
data.value: 欸 年輕人! 我想你因該可以幫助我. 我的帽子不見了.但是我找了每個地方都找不到

data.name: Z235
data.value: 你們三個人可以幫我找一下嗎? 你們會認出那就是我的帽子. 因為我把我的名子繡在帽子的邊緣

data.name: Z236
data.value: 如果你們找到的話 . 我會報答你們豐厚的獎賞. 祝你們幸運!

data.name: Z237
data.value: 什麼? 你們找到我的帽子了? 嗯蠻有道裡的!

data.name: Z239
data.value: 嗯. 非常感謝你們 這是獎賞.就像我答應過你們的.

data.name: Z240
data.value: 你找到了 藥水(中) X2

data.name: Z241
data.value: 和 500黃金

data.name: Z242
data.value: 年輕人真的很謝謝你找到我的帽子. 希望沒有造成你太多困擾!

data.name: Z243
data.value: 你或許覺得Endor笨笨的.但我不是,我會注意你的!

data.name: Z244
data.value: 所以你把圖書館清理乾淨了?嗯...但是我還是不相信你

data.name: Z245
data.value: 我會幫你把時空之門打開的

data.name: Z246
data.value: 你知道沼澤鎮有嚴重的瘟疫嗎?就在我們東邊的城鎮

data.name: Z247
data.value: 我真同情那些窮困的人們

data.name: Z248
data.value: 我每天只要一醒來就開時幫人們治療.但是他們還是沒有好轉...

data.name: Z249
data.value: 你找到 巫師之帽!

data.name: Z250
data.value: 你找到 補藥(大) X3!

data.name: Z251
data.value: 你撿起了一隻鑰匙!

data.name: Z252
data.value: 你找到 翻翻!

data.name: Z253
data.value: 我怎麼帶著我全新的白項鍊. 我現在要走了.我會弄丟它..

data.name: Z254
data.value: 真是個美好的一天!

data.name: Z255
data.value: 去找Endor吧! 我相信它會有辦法幫你的!

data.name: Z256
data.value: 你撿起了一本書!

data.name: Z257
data.value: 一定是我那個討厭的鄰居偷了我的書!

data.name: Z258
data.value: 我昨天晚上把它放在這個桌子上. 現在居然不見了!

data.name: Z259
data.value: 你可以幫我一個忙嗎? 檢查看看這城鎮裡每間房子?

data.name: Z260
data.value: 我相信一定是那些"小偷"拿的!

data.name: Z261
data.value: 你可以幫我找到我的書嗎?

data.name: Z262
data.value: 真不敢相信我和一群"小偷"住在一起!

data.name: Z263
data.value: 啊!

data.name: Z264
data.value: 它一直都在樓上?

data.name: Z265
data.value: 一定是那些小偷 打破窗子進來, 把我的書移到上面去!

data.name: Z266
data.value: 嗯...隨便啦. 你看起來不像小偷. 拿去吧!

data.name: Z268
data.value: 唉,小朋友這幾天!

data.name: Z269
data.value: 我計畫把這間房子買下來. 它現在雖然是空房.我只需賺一些錢把它買下.

data.name: Z270
data.value: 噓~不要告訴其他人.我有時候晚上都偷偷睡在這裡.假裝我住在這裡.

data.name: Z271
data.value: 我每天都讀床前故事給我想像的小孩聽. 我需要住在這裡, 這是我的使命.

data.name: Z272
data.value: 這完全沒有道理. 有人住在這裡! 我告訴我爸, 有一天我一定會住進來!

data.name: Z273
data.value: 我要永遠離開! 我只希望住在這裡的人會愛這間房子. 像我一樣,如果我可以住進來.

data.name: Z274
data.value: 所以... 旅行者, 或許我們會在哪裡再碰面.

data.name: Z275
data.value: 怎麼又是你? 聽著! 這山洞裡有著奇怪的生物.我需要找他們的居住地.我要成為他們部落的一份子.

data.name: Z276
data.value: 這些生物看起來原始人, 他們人好像還不錯. 我只是想說, 我們因該去找找看

data.name: Z277
data.value: 你打開了箱子!

data.name: Z278
data.value: 你似乎傭有強大的能力

data.name: Z279
data.value: 在右邊. 你可以用這個能力打開時空之門.最些非常特別的事

data.name: Z280
data.value: 讓我們來看看你的能力吧

data.name: Z281
data.value: 在某個你曾經去過的地方.我把鑰駛放在那.用它來打開箱子

data.name: Z282
data.value: 如果你想要找到鑰駛就要一定要解開謎語

data.name: Z283
data.value: 在充滿蟲害沼澤鎮,你會找到鑰駛在休息的地方

data.name: Z284
data.value: 謎語是 :

data.name: Z285
data.value: 在沼澤鎮. 一個有青蛙跳躍的地方.你會找到鑰駛在賣東西的地方

data.name: Z286
data.value: 你解出我所有的謎語!

data.name: Z287
data.value: 打開箱子吧, 有個驚喜給你!

data.name: Z288
data.value: 你值得擁有開啟時空之門的能力

data.name: Z289
data.value: 你還沒找到鑰駛?

data.name: Z290
data.value: 你是新來的嗎?

data.name: Z291
data.value: 如果你是在找鐵匠的話.那你還真不幸

data.name: Z292
data.value: 我們已經沒有這個東西一陣子了

data.name: Z293
data.value: 但是謠言指出 那位隱士就住在北方,他曾經是世上最厲害的鐵匠

data.name: Z294
data.value: 那只是個謠言, 當然. 我不會太在意這個謠言

data.name: Z295
data.value: 所以那位隱士是真的鐵匠大師....

data.name: Z296
data.value: 我以為他指是另外一個瘋老頭.

data.name: Z297
data.value: 孩子.你再找什麼嗎?

data.name: Z298
data.value: 你看起來不像本地人. 你是哪裡人?陌生人.

data.name: Z299
data.value: 喔...你一定是ㄧ個內向的人!

data.name: Z300
data.value: 你可以不要一直盯著我嗎? 我快被你嚇死了

data.name: Z301
data.value: 拜託, 幫幫我們.

data.name: Z302
data.value: 我怕我兒子可能撐不了這麼久!

data.name: Z303
data.value: 你救了我的兒子, 我會銘記在心的!

data.name: Z304
data.value: 抓到!!

data.name: Z305
data.value: 我居然被你困住了.我差點就跑掉了

data.name: Z306
data.value: 沒有人可以抓到我!

data.name: Z307
data.value: 不要告訴我, 你們要拿走黃金!

data.name: Z308
data.value: 記住!! 你永遠都別想抓到我!

data.name: Z309
data.value: 媽你在哪裡??? 我走丟了...

data.name: Z310
data.value: 你知道我媽在哪裡嗎? 告訴我...

data.name: Z311
data.value: 把你的玩具撿起來!

data.name: Z312
data.value: 我小孩不見了..你可以幫我找到他嗎?

data.name: Z313
data.value: 我有點不舒服....

data.name: Z314
data.value: 我現在感覺很多了

data.name: Z315
data.value: 你揀起來筆記本

data.name: Z316
data.value: 這個沒有希望的地方, 為什麼讓我出生在這裡.

data.name: Z317
data.value: 我怕我們會失敗...

data.name: Z318
data.value: Chepetawa, 你怎麼可以...

data.name: Z319
data.value: 你聽說妳就是那個打敗Chepetawa. 謝謝你, 你人真好

data.name: Z320
data.value: 誰想買蛇靴?

data.name: Z322
data.value: 謝謝你拯救了我的生命!

data.name: Z323
data.value: 希望我能趕快好起來, 這樣我就能出去玩了

data.name: Z324
data.value: 能再出來玩感覺真好~

data.name: Z326
data.value: 該死的 Chepetawa!我才不會像他一樣.

data.name: Z327
data.value: 你就是那個擊敗Chepetawa的年輕人.

data.name: Z328
data.value: 能見到你真是我的榮幸.

data.name: Z329
data.value: 這個鼠疫會害死我們.

data.name: Z330
data.value: 謝謝你拯救了我們村莊, 年輕人.

data.name: Z331
data.value: 請阻止 Chepetawa. 這是唯一的辦法可以拯救我門村莊

data.name: Z332
data.value: 我永遠都歡迎你!

data.name: Z333
data.value: 當我在商店前玩玩具的時候. 怪獸就出現了. 他把我的玩具搶走了.

data.name: Z334
data.value: 他拿走我的玩具. 我要不回來...

data.name: Z335
data.value: 來跟我走, 我帶你去找它

data.name: Z336
data.value: 拜託, 把我的玩具帶回來

data.name: Z337
data.value: 你這身本領是在哪學的? 大俠.

data.name: Z338
data.value: 謝謝, 讓那個可惡的怪獸把我的玩具還來!

data.name: Z339
data.value: 請收下這個舊戒指, 我在地上找到的

data.name: Z340
data.value: 這個玩具是我的最愛. 謝謝你把它帶回來.

data.name: Z341
data.value: 上 ,左 ,下 ,右 ,右 ,左

data.name: Z342
data.value: 你找到 衝突之戒!

data.name: Z343
data.value: 你找到 光亮之戒!

data.name: Z344
data.value: 你找到 暗影突襲之戒

data.name: Z345
data.value: 你找到 玉雕像

data.name: Z346
data.value: 你找到 藍寶石之戒

data.name: Z347
data.value: 你收到了 黑曜之石

data.name: Z348
data.value: 嘿! 小心這些瘋狂傢伙. 特別是你左邊那個

data.name: Z349
data.value: 他現在手上拿著一個錢包, 我非常確定不是他的

data.name: Z350
data.value: 嘿! 小心這些瘋狂的傢伙, 特別是你....欸 他人勒? 他跑去哪了?

data.name: Z351
data.value: 他一定是帶著偷來的皮夾逃走了!

data.name: Z352
data.value: 你喜歡這個夜晚, 你呢?

data.name: Z353
data.value: 這個村莊總算平靜多了, 我可已不用在人擠人的買東西了

data.name: Z354
data.value: 如果你在找些特別的東西,你最好快一點!

data.name: Z355
data.value: 這些商店開這麼晚,老闆一定都很晚睡.

data.name: Z356
data.value: 歡迎來到市場, 所有的商品都來治這個村莊.

data.name: Z357
data.value: 你有需要什麼特別的東西嗎?

data.name: Z358
data.value: 所有商店都要關了, 你或許可以拿到一些好價錢, 幸運的話.

data.name: Z359
data.value: 豪宅的主人太有錢了, 而且只把錢花在自己的身上.

data.name: Z360
data.value: 他擁有這個市場, 他雇用了一些人假裝站在攤位前面, 讓你感覺他快要賣完了.

data.name: Z361
data.value: 他搞壞了這裡的經濟, 所以他因該承受東西被偷走!

data.name: Z362
data.value: 看吧,他根本就什麼感覺都沒有.

data.name: Z363
data.value: 看吧, 就跟我說的一樣

data.name: Z364
data.value: 有些有為的年輕人或許會歸還那些他們偷的東西.

data.name: Z365
data.value: 然後一些善良的撒瑪利亞人會在圖書館跟邪惡的魔法螳螂對抗.

data.name: Z366
data.value: 什麼? 有一半的故事不是正確的?

data.name: Z367
data.value: 事實上, 你所說完全不正確, 你是我見過最愚蠢人的人了

data.name: Z368
data.value: 愚蠢人根本就不是個字

data.name: Z369
data.value: *嘆息*

data.name: Z370
data.value: *哈欠* 某方面來講豪宅主人就像個搶匪. 真希望我能離開這個鬼地方!

data.name: Z371
data.value: 我都不記得上次我離開這個地方是什麼時候了, 真想睡在我的床上.

data.name: Z372
data.value: Zzzzz... 什麼? Michael's 又在睡覺? 我已經開始感到厭煩了..

data.name: Z373
data.value: Zzzzzzzzzz...

data.name: Z374
data.value: 我看他要睡掉他的工作了.

data.name: Z375
data.value: 不要光站在這裡, 那個小偷要跑走了. 去抓住他孩子.

data.name: Z376
data.value: 怎麼又是你, 我想你可以待在這邊, 但是不要碰任何東西.

data.name: Z377
data.value: 你一定要幫我, 我的錢包被偷了

data.name: Z378
data.value: 這.......是我的錢包嗎? 真是謝謝你!

data.name: Z379
data.value: 拜託請收下, 這是我一點心意.

data.name: Z380
data.value: 我想我們在也不會看到那個渾蛋. 你是我們的救星.

data.name: Z381
data.value: 晚上這些商家特別大方

data.name: Z382
data.value: 他們已經準備要回家了, 所以會用很便宜的價錢趕快賣出去.

data.name: Z383
data.value: 如果你知道該怎麼做. 你會做得很好

data.name: Z384
data.value: 歡迎光臨, 請隨便看.

data.name: Z385
data.value: 我從來沒有機會買結婚紀念品給我老婆. 我回家的時候他一定會很生氣.

data.name: Z386
data.value: 你想要給商家項鍊嗎?

data.name: Z387
data.value: 這是什麼? 非常地謝謝你. 世界上因該有更多這樣的好事.

data.name: Z388
data.value: 我沒有太多東西可以回報你, 但是我相信我只少可以找到一些.

data.name: Z389
data.value: 嗯..這個,全新的刮鬍刀.

data.name: Z390
data.value: 拜託,請收下這個刮鬍刀, 來表示我的心意.

data.name: Z391
data.value: 歡迎光臨, 買東西或離開!

data.name: Z392
data.value: 你到底要做什麼?我趕著離開,快決定或滾開!

data.name: Z393
data.value: 你想用劍來跟商店交易嗎?

data.name: Z394
data.value: 哇.你有把不錯的劍, 我想你最好當一個乖女孩, 然後把劍拿給我.

data.name: Z395
data.value: 你不會想要引起大家的注意!

data.name: Z396
data.value: 我是最後一間商店還開著. 你最好快點回來. 如果你知道什麼是對你好了話.

data.name: Z397
data.value: 你在威脅我嗎?

data.name: Z398
data.value: 你最好再仔細想想. 在我傷害你之前.

data.name: Z399
data.value: 你在不停止. 我不知道會發生什麼事.

data.name: Z400
data.value: 嘿嘿嘿, 你最好有這麼厲害.

data.name: Z401
data.value: 我不想傷害這漂亮的臉蛋, 但是需要有人給你一個教訓.

data.name: Z402
data.value: That got out of hand fast. Looks like I knocked him out.

data.name: Z403
data.value: Oh wow! This would be perfect for Nathan! I think I'll take it.

data.name: Z404
data.value: I'll leave the display sword. It was junk anyway, and I'd hate to feel like I'm stealing.

data.name: Z405
data.value: Cara has received Nathan's Gift.

data.name: Z406
data.value: He's still knocked out. I better get back to Nathan before this guy comes to his senses.

data.name: Z407
data.value: AH! Get her away from me! Please don't let her hurt me!

data.name: Z408
data.value: Some advice for you...

data.name: Z409
data.value: Don't make her angry if you value your health.

data.name: Z410
data.value: Hello there young lad! If you were looking for something to buy, I'm afraid I'm closed.

data.name: Z411
data.value: I'm just waiting to see if anyone in town would like to buy my space and I'll never return!

data.name: Z412
data.value: Everybody's in debt to the mansion owner, and it's just too much for me.

data.name: Z413
data.value: Some guy hired me to save this space for him until he finds out what he wants to do.

data.name: Z414
data.value: I'm not complaining, I'm getting paid to do nothing!

data.name: Z415
data.value: My boss said you'd come browse our accessories. Would you like to buy something?

data.name: Z416
data.value: HI HOW ARE YOU!? I...I... there's nothing going on he-

data.name: Z417
data.value: AHHHHHH!

data.name: Z418
data.value: Oh what? Yeah, I don't have anybody's purse...

data.name: Z419
data.value: Don't look at me!

data.name: Z420
data.value: Ack! How did you find me! Did the mimbies tell you where I was?

data.name: Z421
data.value: Nobody believes me! I know they're around here somewhere. They probably stole the purse that I have.

data.name: Z422
data.value: WAIT! If I have the purse, then they don't have the purse!

data.name: Z423
data.value: Look over there!

data.name: Z424
data.value: Rats! I knew I should have hid under the b-b-b-bed.

data.name: Z425
data.value: Ha! Remember when we first met? Those were the good old days. We played Duck Duck Goose and we did jumping jacks.

data.name: Z426
data.value: Why is it called Duck Duck Goose? Well I know when night falls, ducks grow teeth and become carnivorous beasts and-

data.name: Z427
data.value: Oh yeah, I need to make my escape!

data.name: Z428
data.value: Rock-a-bye baby in the tree top...

data.name: Z429
data.value: Woah! I remember you from before! You were the...

data.name: Z430
data.value: Uhh... the...

data.name: Z431
data.value: Oh yeah! That guy with the hair.

data.name: Z432
data.value: Here, take this purse, I don't remember what I wanted to do with it. Bye, friends!

data.name: Z433
data.value: The owner of this mansion is a bad man! He's only giving me food. I don't need food, I need money.

data.name: Z434
data.value: Could you spare a gold piece?

data.name: Z435
data.value: You are just as bad as the owner of the mansion! Come back when you start to feel sorry for me.

data.name: Z436
data.value: Hmmm, could you spare me 481 gold then?

data.name: Z437
data.value: Oh well, I guess I'll just open a store here. I had high hopes for a place up north, but I guess I can start here.

data.name: Z438
data.value: If you ever start to feel sorry for me, drop by and give me that gold you know you should have given me now.

data.name: Z439
data.value: Really? I'll see you later... maybe. Thanks for doing the right thing!

data.name: Z440
data.value: Ha! you're just as poor as me, come back when you make money.

data.name: Z441
data.value: Hey, it's you again! Thanks to you, I've opened a ring shop. Would you like to view my merchandise?

data.name: Z442
data.value: Oh... well are you going to give me 480 gold then?

data.name: Z443
data.value: *Sigh*... I guess I'll never live life to the fullest. I'll never be able to fulfill my dreams.

data.name: Z444
data.value: Wow! It's you again. I just knew I'd see you again, that's why I left without saying anything before.

data.name: Z445
data.value: You made me rich, here, take this for free. Thanks for the help! I am a changed man now.

data.name: Z446
data.value: I sure do fancy the rich life, it's quite spectacular indeed. My chaps are starting a new store back at my home.

data.name: Z447
data.value: I say, you should scuttle your way over there now. This conversation has been quite pleasant, hmm, yes, pleasant indeed. Good day, chum!

data.name: Z448
data.value: Sorry, sir, but all my merchandise is sold out, except for this one bag of seeds.

data.name: Z449
data.value: These seeds are very rare and are rumored to grow into a plant with magical properties.

data.name: Z450
data.value: But no one seems to want to buy them.

data.name: Z451
data.value: I'll sell them to you for

data.name: Z452
data.value: Really?! Thank you, sir!

data.name: Z453
data.value: Oh well, I guess I'm still stuck with them then.

data.name: Z454
data.value: Sorry, I have nothing left to sell. Thanks for stopping by.

data.name: Z455
data.value: Oh, it looks like you do not have enough money.

data.name: Z456
data.value: You have received a bag of rare seeds!

data.name: Z457
data.value: Hello, would you like to purchase this fine necklace I have here? It's a real bargain.

data.name: Z458
data.value: Pleasure doing business with you. Hope to see you agian.

data.name: Z459
data.value: The offer only lasts until I close. Come back if you change your mind.

data.name: Z460
data.value: Sorry, I'm closed for the night. Please come back tomorrow.

data.name: Z461
data.value: Cara has recieved a Necklace.

data.name: Z462
data.value: Here is your scythe. As you can clearly see, my skill far exceeds that two-bit hack who repaired your sword.

data.name: Z463
data.value: I see the blacksmith that repaired your sorry excuse for a weapon sent you over here to gloat.

data.name: Z464
data.value: I don't have time for this. Get out!

data.name: Z465
data.value: So you broke your scythe, eh? And now you come crying to me to fix it. Am I correct?

data.name: Z466
data.value: Well, it's not going to be cheap.

data.name: Z467
data.value: I'll fix it for

data.name: Z468
data.value: It will be ready tomorrow. Now get out of here. I'm tired of looking at your face.

data.name: Z469
data.value: Too expensive for you eh?

data.name: Z470
data.value: Well, that's too bad. I don't negotiate. Especially with the likes of you!

data.name: Z471
data.value: Who are you trying to fool, kid? Come back when you have enough money.

data.name: Z472
data.value: I hate repeating myself, kid! I said it will be ready tomorrow!

data.name: Z473
data.value: You again?

data.name: Z474
data.value: There is nothing you have that needs repairing. So stop wasting my time!

data.name: Z475
data.value: Hello missy. What can I do for you?

data.name: Z476
data.value: Would you like to offer the beard trimmer to the merchant for a trade?

data.name: Z477
data.value: Oh so you want to trade that beard trimmer for one of my wares, eh?

data.name: Z478
data.value: Is there something wrong with my beard? I guess it could use a little attention.

data.name: Z479
data.value: Well I do have this display sword that no one seems to want.

data.name: Z480
data.value: Turns out impractical weapons aren't in much demand these days.

data.name: Z481
data.value: How about we trade your trimmer for my sword?

data.name: Z482
data.value: Nothing, eh? Okay well I'll be leaving soon so hurry back if you change your mind.

data.name: Z483
data.value: Cara has received a Display Sword.

data.name: Z484
data.value: Thanks for the trimmers. I'm sure to impress the ladies now.

data.name: Z485
data.value: You found a Ring Of Calling!

data.name: Z486
data.value: You found a Ring of Veneration!

data.name: Z487
data.value: You found a Ring of Bravura!

data.name: Z488
data.value: You found a Ring of The Sages!

data.name: Z489
data.value: You found a key to the courtyard door!

data.name: Z490
data.value: Hey, how would you like to play a game?

data.name: Z491
data.value: Great! Okay this is how you play. I am going to put a treasure in this chest next to me.

data.name: Z492
data.value: You need to watch that chest and see if you can pick it out once the chests stop moving.

data.name: Z493
data.value: If you can find the treasure on your first try, you get to keep it.

data.name: Z494
data.value: Ready.......and.......START!

data.name: Z495
data.value: Your loss.....

data.name: Z496
data.value: Come back if you change your mind.

data.name: Z497
data.value: You chose an empty chest.

data.name: Z498
data.value: You found a Shadow Strike Ring!

data.name: Z499
data.value: Wow! I can't believe you were able to pick the right chest. I thought you were blind.

data.name: Z500
data.value: Sorry, but you only get one shot.

data.name: Z501
data.value: I sense a stong power in you. Be careful not to let it consume you.

data.name: Z502
data.value: Have you heard of hallows?

data.name: Z503
data.value: When a mage feels they have been wronged by a non-magic user, they typically make them a hallow.

data.name: Z504
data.value: When a mage makes a hallow they take away one of their victims' five senses. The sense that they take away is decided by how badly the mage was wronged.

data.name: Z505
data.value: The lesser senses, like touch, taste, and smell, are for minor offenses. A mage will only take hearing or sight if they feel greatly wronged.

data.name: Z506
data.value: The moles are asleep for the night. Try coming back in the morning.

data.name: Z507
data.value: Celindar is dangerous at night. Sleep walking is common in us mages and sometimes we leave our homes.

data.name: Z508
data.value: You would be amazed to see what can happen when you're confronted by a sleep walking mage. It gets ugly.

data.name: Z509
data.value: You caused quite a ruckus when you and your friends showed up here. Don't try to start anything. I say this for your own good.

data.name: Z510
data.value: Get away from me creep!

data.name: Z511
data.value: You found a Large Potion X3!

data.name: Z512
data.value: You found a Large Potion X4!

data.name: Z513
data.value: Wait!!!!

data.name: Z514
data.value: You're going on a quest to find your identity, aren't you?

data.name: Z515
data.value: Well, I can't let you go alone. You're still recovering after all.

data.name: Z516
data.value: I'm going to join you, and you have absolutely no say in the matter!

data.name: Z517
data.value: Cara has joined your party!

data.name: Z518
data.value: Looting this village is gonna be easier than we thought!

data.name: Z519
data.value: Yeah, all they had to slow us down was a couple of wimpy guards.

data.name: Z520
data.value: Hey, check this guy out. He thinks he's safe hiding behind those trees!

data.name: Z521
data.value: Let's get him!

data.name: Z522
data.value: Oh no! The village is under attack by bandits! What do we do? What do we do!?

data.name: Z523
data.value: Sorry, sir, we can't allow you to leave. It's for your own safety.

data.name: Z524
data.value: Due to the increasing number of bandits in the vicinity, the town is currently on lock down.

data.name: Z525
data.value: Oh! You're finally awake. Don't be alarmed, you're safe here. We found you in the forest.

data.name: Z526
data.value: My name's Cara. I've been taking good care of you. You may want to take it easy for a little while.

data.name: Z527
data.value: So what's your name?

data.name: Z528
data.value: You don't remember, do you?

data.name: Z529
data.value: Do you remember where you came from, how you got hurt, anything?!

data.name: Z530
data.value: Thats terrible...

data.name: Z531
data.value: Well try taking a walk around town. There are plenty of nice people for you to meet, and I'm sure they'd like to meet you too.

data.name: Z532
data.value: Hopefully some fresh air will help jog your memory.

data.name: Z533
data.value: Please, feel free to take the potions over there in the chest. They may come in handy later.

data.name: Z534
data.value: Oh, before you go, my dad said he would like you to keep this practice sword with you. Just in case you run into any trouble.

data.name: Z535
data.value: Well, you look ready to go. I won't keep you any longer. Stay safe!

data.name: Z536
data.value: You have recieved a Ring of Courage and 500 gold pieces.

data.name: Z537
data.value: ... And then I said, that's no mushroom, that's my wife! Ho ho ho, ho!

data.name: Z538
data.value: Dad! Look! It's a handsome young man!

data.name: Z539
data.value: Now, now, Cara. He needs our help and hospitality. Grab his legs, we'll let him stay in our house, he needs rest.

data.name: Z540
data.value: I'll watch him!

data.name: Z541
data.value: ... To make sure he's okay, and he stays healthy and stuff...

data.name: Z542
data.value: Cara, that's...

data.name: Z543
data.value: A marvelous idea!

data.name: Z544
data.value: Somebody help us! There's too many of 'em!

data.name: Z545
data.value: It's good to see you Cara. And you too...

data.name: Z546
data.value: His name is Nathan, Dad. He was able to remember some things. How's the town been since we have been gone?

data.name: Z547
data.value: Calm so far. However, there have been sightings of bandits in the Mushroom Forest.

data.name: Z548
data.value: And rumors that the Bandit King himself has set up camp there.

data.name: Z549
data.value: I have warned all villagers to stay away for the time being.

data.name: Z550
data.value: So your father's the mayor? He must have some pretty nice things...

data.name: Z551
data.value: Dont even think about it!

data.name: Z552
data.value: RAAAAAR!!

data.name: Z553
data.value: Well, we're finally here.

data.name: Z554
data.value: It looks like we're not the only ones here for the artifact. Do you think we're too late?

data.name: Z555
data.value: The bodies are still warm. They were killed recently. If we hurry, we may be able to save someone.

data.name: Z556
data.value: But don't forget, the artifact is still our top priority. Let's go!

data.name: Z557
data.value: Help! Monsters are attacking the castle!

data.name: Z558
data.value: Rar!

data.name: Z559
data.value: BRWWAAAR!!

data.name: Z560
data.value: GRRAAWR!

data.name: Z561
data.value: The Keeper!

data.name: Z562
data.value: He's dead...

data.name: Z563
data.value: But.. Who killed him? And where's the artifact!

data.name: Z564
data.value: Wha...

data.name: Z565
data.value: What's happening? Sid! Max!

data.name: Z566
data.value: Heh... heh... heh... heh... You fools...

data.name: Z567
data.value: Who are you? Fight, coward!

data.name: Z568
data.value: Oh, Nathan... Do you really think you can beat me? Your friends are dead, Nathan.

data.name: Z569
data.value: What a naive boy. You truly think you stand a chance against my power.

data.name: Z570
data.value: Enough of this nonsense! Show yourself, this instant!

data.name: Z571
data.value: Heh heh heh heh... As you command, boy...

data.name: Z572
data.value: I didn't plan on you being here, Nathan, but it doesn't matter now. Prepare to join your friends in the afterlife!

data.name: Z573
data.value: It is time for you to witness my power!

data.name: Z574
data.value: Maybe you will be able to figure out how to get my gold.

data.name: Z575
data.value: So, you cleansed the library. Thank you, young travelers. You may go now.

data.name: Z576
data.value: Hold it! you said that you were going to tell us something important.

data.name: Z577
data.value: Important?

data.name: Z578
data.value: Oh yes, now I remember.

data.name: Z579
data.value: You must forgive me, my memory is not what it used to be.

data.name: Z580
data.value: If I were only twenty years younger I...

data.name: Z581
data.value: You would still be ancient. Now get on with it, old man!

data.name: Z582
data.value: As you wish, impatient one.

data.name: Z583
data.value: Hmmm...

data.name: Z584
data.value: Ah yes, here it is. The Legend of the Lacuna Blades.

data.name: Z585
data.value: The story of these swords begins in a time long forgotten, when our two great continents, Ellaethia and Agora, were one.

data.name: Z586
data.value: During this time, magic was much more commonplace than it is today.

data.name: Z587
data.value: Every individual possessed the ability to control magic, not just a select few.

data.name: Z588
data.value: Magic was practiced constantly, and often abused.

data.name: Z589
data.value: This over-use of magic attracted an evil from the darkest corner of the void.

data.name: Z590
data.value: The demon known as Mal'ticar.

data.name: Z591
data.value: This malevolent demon craved magical energy.

data.name: Z592
data.value: It would pass from town to town in its search for new sources of magic, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake.

data.name: Z593
data.value: Its thirst for power could never be satisfied.

data.name: Z594
data.value: In a desperate attempt to escape, a large number of villagers sought refuge in the northern part of the continent.

data.name: Z595
data.value: With their combined strength, they cast a spell that cleaved the land in two.

data.name: Z596
data.value: This created a natural ocean barrier between them and Mal'ticar.

data.name: Z597
data.value: Those who were not fortunate enough to flee to the north were trapped on the newly created southern continent with Mal'ticar.

data.name: Z598
data.value: These people were forced to come together to fight off the demon.

data.name: Z599
data.value: With remarkable ingenuity, the natives of the southern continent imbued all of their magical energy into several swords.

data.name: Z600
data.value: These swords had the power to cut the very fabric of space.

data.name: Z601
data.value: They were called Lacuna Blades.

data.name: Z602
data.value: And those who were chosen to wield the blades were given the name Lacuna Reavers.

data.name: Z603
data.value: A group of these Lacuna Reavers used their swords to cut a rift in space and sealed Mal'ticar in another dimension for all time.
